Spotify Songs

```{r, error=FALSE,warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)

dat1 <- read_csv(here::here("data", "spotify_songs.csv"))

dat1 %>%
  select(danceability, track_popularity) %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x = danceability, y = track_popularity)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.1) +
  geom_smooth()
```
